cause.description:
In Uganda there has been a terrible civil war going on for many years. Rebels against the government. Both parties extremely corrupt. The rebels being ruthless and brutal, use children as soldiers. They are brain washed drugged and forced into a world of insanity, slaughter, and genocide. Children as young as 8 carry and use automatic rifles. Most of them end mutilated.
If you heart is beeping for these children visit www.invisiblechildren.com and find out how you can help.
1. God created all men equal
2. America needs to aid Africa in there struggle against the rebels
3. People should never live by fear
cause.mission: Inform Americans about the children soldiers in Africa
cause.name: The Invisible Children
